logicalTable.name: D0 Time2
logicalTable.description: This logical table maps to the physical Time Dimension tables at Day and Month grains. It federatess 2 distinct physical tables : one at the Day grain level, one at the month level. BIEE server will pick the most appropriate source based on the context of each user query.

logicalColumns.name: Calendar Date
logicalColumns.description:
Calendar Date uniquely identifies each record in the Time dimension table. 
Stores the date information in the format MM/DD/YYYY.  Eg :- 11/12/2006

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Calendar_Date

logicalColumns.name: Per Name Week
logicalColumns.description: Per Name Week- Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Number. Eg :- 2005 Week 44

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Per_Name_Week

logicalColumns.name: Per Name Month
logicalColumns.description: Per Name Month. Stores the month information in the format YYYY / MM. Eg :- 2006 / 11

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Per_Name_Month
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Per_Name_Month

logicalColumns.name: Per Name Qtr
logicalColumns.description: Per Name Qtr. Stores the Quarter information in the format YYYY QQuarterNumber. Eg :- 2005 Q3

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Per_Name_Qtr
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Per_Name_Qtr

logicalColumns.name: Per Name Half
logicalColumns.description: Per Name Half. Stores the Half year information in the format YYYY HYHalfYearNumber. Eg :- 2006 HY2

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Per_Name_Half
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Per_Name_Half

logicalColumns.name: Per Name Year
logicalColumns.description: Per Name Year. Stores the year information in the format YYYY. Eg :- 2006

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Per_Name_Year
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Per_Name_Year

logicalColumns.name: Row Wid
logicalColumns.description:
Row Wid uniquely identifies a row in the Time dimension table and stores the date information in the format YYYYMMDD.
Eg :- 20051101.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Day_Key
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Mth_Key

logicalColumns.name: Day Of Week
logicalColumns.description: Day of Week is an integer and is a value between 1 and 7

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Day_Of_Week

logicalColumns.name: Day Of Month
logicalColumns.description: Day of Month is an integer and a value between 1 and 31.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Day_Of_Month

logicalColumns.name: Day Of Year
logicalColumns.description: Day of Year is an integer and a value between 1 and 366.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Day_Of_Year

logicalColumns.name: Julian Day Num
logicalColumns.description: Stores the Julian Day Number as an integer.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Julian_Day_Num

logicalColumns.name: Julian Week Num
logicalColumns.description: Stores the Julian Week Number as an integer.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Julian_Week_Num

logicalColumns.name: Julian Month Num
logicalColumns.description: Stores the Julian Month Number as an integer.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Julian_Month_Num
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Julian_Month_Num

logicalColumns.name: Julian Qtr Num
logicalColumns.description: Stores the Julian Quarter Number as an integer.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain.Julian_Qtr_Num
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain.Julian_Qtr_Num

tables: physicalTable:Sample App Lite Data.D01 Time Day Grain
physicalTable:Sample App Lite Data.D02 Time Month Grain
